string-array.name: loading_messages
string-array.item: Letter \'J\' does not appear in\nany chemical symbols.
The first elements were\nthought to be fire, water, wind\nand earth.
Hydrogen is the most\nabundant element in the entire\nuniverse.
Every lightning strike\nproduces ozone (O3) for the\nozone layer.
Early chemistry usages\ndates back to at earliest\nduring Ancient Egypt.
Aluminium is the most\nabundant metal in the\nEarth\'s crust.
The history of chemistry\ncan trace back to the\npseudoscience called alchemy.
